sentence.Network_en: No matter where you go in life or how old you get, there's always something new to learn about. After all, life is full of surprises.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管你生活在哪里，你有多少岁，总有新东西要学习，毕竟，生活总是充满惊喜。

sentence.Network_en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentence.Network_cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentence.Network_en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

list.abs: a stratum of ore or coal thick enough to be mined with profit ., 含有厚到可以开采并获利的矿石或煤的地层.
ball mill can grind ore or other materials that can be grinded either by wet process or by dry process .本机运转平稳，工作可靠。注：根据物料及排矿方式，可选择干式球磨机和湿式格子型球磨机。
levelling machine for earth minerals or ores not self - propelled., 土壤 , 矿物或矿石整平机 , 非自动推进式的.
fettle : to line the hearth of ( a reverberatory furnace ) with loose sand or ore in preparation for pouring molten metal .涂(炉膛):为倒入熔化的金属作准备而用松散的沙子或矿渣涂(反射炉的)炉膛。
A machine that crushes rock or ore ., 颚形碎石机一种碾碎岩石或矿石的机器.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: a reduced form of the obsolete conjunction other (which superseded Old English oththe 'or'), of uncertain ultimate origin
early 16th cent.: from French, from Latin aurum 'gold'

entry.tran: （连接两个或两个以上选择的可能性）或，或者，还是
entry.def: You use or to link two or more alternatives.

example.tran: 她的头发是金色还是深褐色？

entry.tran: （与 either 或 whether 连用，给出另一个选择项）或，还是，就是
entry.def: You use or to give another alternative, when the first alternative is introduced by 'either' or 'whether'.

example.ex: Items like bread, milk and meat were either unavailable or could be obtained only on the black market...
example.tran: 像面包、牛奶和肉之类的东西要么是买不到，要么就是只能去黑市买。

example.ex: Either you can talk to him, or I will...
example.tran: 要么你跟他谈，要么我去。

entry.tran: （用于两个数字之间表示概数）或，大约
entry.def: You use or between two numbers to indicate that you are giving an approximate amount.

example.ex: Everyone benefited from limiting their intake of tea to just three or four cups a day...
example.tran: 每天只喝三四杯茶对身体有益。

example.ex: When I was nine or ten someone explained to me that when you are grown up you have to work...
example.tran: 我大概9岁或10岁的时候，有人跟我说人长大了就得工作。

entry.tran: （用于对刚说过的话进行更正或补充）或者说
entry.def: You use or to introduce a comment which corrects or modifies what you have just said.

example.ex: The man was a fool, he thought, or at least incompetent...
example.tran: 他想道，那人是个傻瓜，或者说，至少很无能。

example.ex: There was nothing more he wanted, or so he thought...
example.tran: 他再无所求，或者说他是这么想的。

entry.def: If you say that someone should do something or something unpleasant will happen, you are warning them that if they do not do it, the unpleasant thing will happen.

example.ex: She had to have the operation, or she would die.
example.tran: 她必须动手术，要不然就没命了。

entry.tran: （用于证明刚刚所作陈述的真实性）否则，要不然
entry.def: You use or to introduce something which is evidence for the truth of a statement you have just made.

example.ex: He must have thought Jane was worth it or he wouldn't have wasted time on her, I suppose.
example.tran: 我想，他一定认为简值得他这么做，否则他不会在她身上浪费时间。

entry.tran: （表示某事物对即将发生的事没有影响）不管是不是…
entry.def: You use or no or or not to emphasize that a particular thing makes no difference to what is going to happen.

example.ex: Chairman or no, if I want to stop the project, I can...
example.tran: 不管我是不是主席，只要我想停止这个项目，我就能做到。

example.ex: The first difficulty is that, old-fashioned or not, it is very good.
example.tran: 首要的难题是，过时也好，不过时也罢，它很不错。

entry.tran: （用于重复的同一名词之间，表示某事物是否真实对情形没有影响）不管是否有…，无论有没有…
entry.def: You use or no between two occurrences of the same noun in order to say that whether something is true or not makes no difference to a situation.

example.ex: The next day, rain or no rain, it was business as usual...
example.tran: 第二天是否下雨都没有差别，一切照常进行。

example.ex: Oil or no oil, Serbia has troubles.
example.tran: 不管是否有石油，塞尔维亚的困难都会存在。

means.word_mean: 1. a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
2. a room in a hospital equipped for the performance of surgical operations;

sentences.sentence: "great care is taken to keep the operating rooms aseptic"

list.explanation: 尽心竭力的(地)，顽强的(地)，不达目的决不罢休的(地)

example.en: He has the obsessive do or die attitude.
example.zh: 他具有极其顽强的态度。

example.en: I was determined to get there—do or die.
example.zh: 我已下定决心要去那儿——不到那儿誓不罢休。

list.explanation: 无论怎样，不管出现什么情况

example.en: I'll find out come hell or high water.
example.zh: 我无论如何要弄个水落石出。

slang.tokens: Shit or get off the pot.

list.explanation: (常用于表示不满或提出要求)不能举棋不定。应当机立断

example.en: The union leader wamed that the city had until Feb. 1 to shit or get off the pot.
example.zh: 工会领抽警告说，市政当局在2月1日之前必须作出决定。

list.explanation: (指某件事)在你家办还是在我家办？

example.en: Your place or mine? It doesn't matter.
example.zh: 在你家办还是在我家办？都可以嘛, 没关系。

means.word_mean: （用以引出另一种可能性）或，或者，还是

sentences.en: A boy or two girls are at home.
sentences.cn: 一个男孩或两个女孩在家。

sentences.en: Mr.Jones or I am to speak at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 会上由琼斯先生或我来发言。

sentences.en: Is the flower red or blue?
Turn the heat down or your cake will burn.
sentences.cn: 把热度调低吧, 要不蛋糕就要糊了。

means.word_mean: （用于否定句，提出两种或多种事物时）也不

sentences.cn: 他不会看书, 也不会写字。

jushi.english: A boy or two girls are at home.
jushi.chinese: 一个男孩或两个女孩在家。

jushi.english: They are living in England or they are spending a vacation there.
jushi.chinese: 他们住在英格兰或者是在那里度假。
他不会看书,也不会写字。
